sentence.Network_en: The journey through the jungle was perilous.
sentence.Network_cn: 穿过丛林的旅行充满了危险.

sentence.Network_en: How did you expect us to proceed on such a perilous expedition, through unknown terrain.
sentence.Network_cn: 你怎么能指望我们如此冒险地穿越未知的地域，继续这一探险？

sentence.Network_en: As the storm was approaching, the fisher - men were threatened by dangers of the most perilous nature.
sentence.Network_cn: 风暴正在来临, 所以渔民们受到迫在眉睫的危胁.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... peril v 冒险 perilous a 危险的 empiric n 经验主义者.
GRE逆序_馆档网 ... photophilous 适光的，喜光的 perilous 危险的，冒险的 scurrilous 下流的、恶言毁谤的.
虐_百度百科 ... 同本义〖 brutal;cruel;andferocious〗 暴烈;险恶〖 violent;perilous〗 无节制;纵情〖 toone’sheart’scontent〗.

list.abs: "perilous"怎么说合适-翻译"perilous"-可可查词 ... perilous situation 惊涛骇浪; perilous peak 险峰; perilous peaks 险峰.
顺便的英文翻译 ... in peace 安祥地 in peril 冒着危险 in peril of 有...的危险使...发生危险.
通常国际贸易用语 - Alex tang的日志 - 网易博客 ... manager 经理 maritime perils 海上危险 maturity 汇票到期日.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: from Old French perillous, from Latin periculosus, from periculum 'danger' (see peril)

entry.def: Something that is perilous is very dangerous.

example.tran: 横穿交战区的危险之旅

example.ex: The road grew even steeper and more perilous.
example.tran: 道路变得越来越陡峭，越来越凶险。

sentences.sentence: "a perilous voyage across the Atlantic in a small boat"
"the precarious life of an undersea diver"
"dangerous surgery followed by a touch-and-go recovery"

auth_sentence.content: The odds are even more perilous for younger artists.
auth_sentence.res_content: The odds are even more perilous for younger artists.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The odds are even more perilous for younger artists.

auth_sentence.content: Lives at risk The trip to Yemen is perilous.
auth_sentence.res_content: Lives at risk The trip to Yemen is perilous.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Lives at risk The trip to Yemen is perilous.

auth_sentence.content: The business of criticism is therefore a perilous one.
auth_sentence.res_content: The business of criticism is therefore a perilous one.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The business of criticism is therefore a perilous one.

stems_affixes.value_cn: 凭经验[或观察]的,经验主义的
stems_affixes.word_buile: empiric[n.经验主义者,[古]江湖医生]+al……的→adj.凭经验[或观察]的,经验主义的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 实验的, 根据实验的
stems_affixes.word_buile: experiment实验+al……的→adj.实验的, 根据实验的
ex出+pert=peri尝试→尝试出来→[成为]专家, 行家

stems_affixes.value_cn: 实验上, 用实验方法
stems_affixes.word_buile: experimental实验的+ly……地→adv.实验上, 用实验方法

stems_affixes.value_cn: 经验主义者,[古]江湖医生
stems_affixes.word_buile: em出+piri=peri尝试+c→尝试出来的→经验
empiric[n.经验主义者,[古]江湖医生]+ism主义→n.经验主义
ex出+peri尝试+ment表名词→尝试出来→实验

stems_affixes.value_cn: 实验, 试验, 实验法
stems_affixes.word_buile: experiment[n.实验;试验 v.[on]进行实验;做试验]+ation表名词→n.实验, 试验, 实验法
ex出+pert=peri尝试→尝试出来→[成为]专家, 行家
ex出+peri尝试+ence表名词→尝试出来的东西→经验
ex出+peri尝试+ment表名词→尝试出来→实验
ex出+pert=peri尝试→尝试出来→[成为]专家, 行家
